price: Ona ayetlerimizin hepsini göstermiştik. Fakat o yalanladı ve diretti.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
